text: David Goldblatt (29 November 1930 – 25 June 2018) was a South African photographer. He was known for his photographs of South Africa during the period of apartheid and more recently that country's landscapes. He called himself as a “self-appointed observer" and "critic of the society into which I was born.” Goldblatt died on 25 June 2018 in Johannesburg from skin cancer, aged 87.David Goldblatt, Acclaimed South African Photographer, Dies at 87 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Photographers Category:South African activists Category:People from Johannesburg Category:South African artists
title: David Goldblatt
